document_data.name: Sergen Hulmaster
document_data.mainbody: Step brother of [[Kara Hulmaster]], Sergen was adopted into the family when his father [[Kamoth Kastelmar]] married Terena Hulmaster. The Hulmasters allowed Sergen to remain a member of the family even after Kamoth's attempt to seize control of [[Hulburg]] in [[1466 DR]]. Sergen teamed up with his father (Kamoth) in an attempt to capture Hulburg in [[1479 DR]] but was killed by [[Geran Hulmaster]].
